verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> accept <S%G4355><s%> the one who is weak <S%G770><s%> in faith, <S%G4102><s%> [but] not for [the purpose of] passing <S%G1253><s%> judgment <S%G1253><s%> on his opinions. <S%G1261><s%>

One <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> man has <S%G4100><s%> faith <S%G4100><s%> that he may eat <S%G2068><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> but he who is weak <S%G770><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> vegetables <S%G3001><s%> [only.]

Let not him who eats <S%G2068><s%> regard <S%G1848><s%> with contempt <S%G1848><s%> him who does not eat, <S%G2068><s%> and let not him who does not eat <S%G2068><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him who eats, <S%G2068><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> has accepted <S%G4355><s%> him.

Who <S%G5101><s%> are you to judge <S%G2919><s%> the servant <S%G3610><s%> of another <S%G245><s%>? To his own <S%G2398><s%> master <S%G2962><s%> he stands <S%G4739><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> falls; <S%G4098><s%> and stand <S%G2476><s%> he will, for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is able <S%G1414><s%> to make <S%G2476><s%> him stand. <S%G2476><s%>

One <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> man regards <S%G2919><s%> one day <S%G2250><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> another, <S%G2250><s%> another <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> regards <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> [alike.] Let each <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G1538><s%> be fully <S%G4135><s%> convinced <S%G4135><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> mind. <S%G3563><s%>

He who observes <S%G5426><s%> the day, <S%G2250><s%> observes <S%G5426><s%> it for the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and he who eats, <S%G2068><s%> does <S%G2068><s%> so <S%G2068><s%> for the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for he gives <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God; <S%G2316><s%> and he who eats <S%G2068><s%> not, for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he does not eat, <S%G2068><s%> and gives <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>
For not one <S%G3762><s%> of us lives <S%G2198><s%> for himself, <S%G1438><s%> and not one <S%G3762><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> for himself; <S%G1438><s%>

for if <S%G1437><s%> we live, <S%G2198><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> for the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> or <S%G5037><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we die, <S%G599><s%> we die <S%G599><s%> for the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> or <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> we are the Lord's.

For to this <S%G3778><s%> end Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%> and lived <S%G2198><s%> [again], that He might be Lord <S%G2961><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> and of the living. <S%G2198><s%>

But you, why <S%G5101><s%> do you judge <S%G2919><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> you again, <S%G2532><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you regard <S%G1848><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> with contempt <S%G1848><s%>? For we shall all <S%G3956><s%> stand <S%G3936><s%> before <S%G3936><s%> the judgment <S%G968><s%> seat <S%G968><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "As I live, <S%G2198><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> shall bow <S%G2578><s%> to Me, And every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> shall give <S%G1843><s%> praise <S%G1843><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>"
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> of us shall give <S%G1325><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> of himself <S%G1438><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> let us not judge <S%G2919><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> anymore, <S%G3371><s%> but rather <S%G3123><s%> determine <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> â€“ not to put <S%G5087><s%> an obstacle <S%G4348><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block <S%G4625><s%> in a brother's way.

I know <S%G3609><s%> and am convinced <S%G3982><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> that nothing <S%G3762><s%> is unclean <S%G2839><s%> in itself; <S%G1438><s%> but to him who thinks <S%G3049><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> to be unclean, <S%G2839><s%> to him it is unclean. <S%G2839><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of food <S%G1033><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> is hurt, <S%G3076><s%> you are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to love. <S%G26><s%> Do not destroy <S%G622><s%> with your food <S%G1033><s%> him for whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> do not let what <S%G18><s%> is for you a good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> be spoken <S%G987><s%> of as evil; <S%G987><s%>

for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not eating <S%G1035><s%> and drinking, <S%G4213><s%> but righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> and joy <S%G5479><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
For he who in this <S%G3778><s%> [way] serves <S%G1398><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and approved <S%G1384><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%>
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> let us pursue <S%G1377><s%> the things which make for peace <S%G1515><s%> and the building <S%G3619><s%> up of one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

Do not tear <S%G2647><s%> down <S%G2647><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for the sake <S%G1752><s%> of food. <S%G1033><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> are clean, <S%G2513><s%> but they are evil <S%G2556><s%> for the man <S%G444><s%> who eats <S%G2068><s%> and gives <S%G1223><s%> offense. <S%G4348><s%>

It is good <S%G2570><s%> not to eat <S%G2068><s%> meat <S%G2907><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> [to do anything] by which <S%G3739><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> stumbles. <S%G4350><s%>

The faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have, <S%G2192><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> as your own <S%G4572><s%> conviction <S%G4572><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Happy <S%G3107><s%> is he who does not condemn <S%G2919><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> in what <S%G3739><s%> he approves. <S%G1381><s%>

But he who doubts <S%G1252><s%> is condemned <S%G2632><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he eats, <S%G2068><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> [his eating is] not from faith; <S%G4102><s%> and whatever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> is not from faith <S%G4102><s%> is sin. <S%G266><s%>
